attr.name: hostname
attr.label: Hostname
attr.tooltipMessage: owserver address. Optional, use it only if different from 'Config from Controller/onewire' section in OpenRemote Designer'

attr.name: port
attr.label: Port
attr.tooltipMessage: owserver port number. Optional, use it if different from 'Config from Controller/onewire' section in OpenRemote Designer'

attr.name: filename
attr.label: Sensor attribute
attr.tooltipMessage: Path to property you want to read or write. If you want this command to react on 1-wire alarm set to 'ALARMING' (alarming currently supports only DS2408 devices)

regex.message: Sensor attribute, such as temperature or humidity

attr.name: pollingInterval
attr.label: Polling interval
attr.tooltipMessage: Polling interval in form of (1s, 1m, 1h) or just milliseconds. If not specified command will not execute periodically (this is not a case if it is ALARMING command

attr.name: data
attr.label: Data to send
attr.tooltipMessage: Data to be sent to a device, eg. '1' or '0' to turn switch on or off. If you want to use this command as a on/off switch set to 'SWITCHING'
